# Treino e teste
```{r}
split <- initial_split(train, strata = y)
treino <- training(split) %>% select(-id)
teste <- testing(split)
```


# Bootstrap
```{r}
train_boot <- bootstraps(treino)
train_boot
```

# Engine do Modelo
```{r}
modelo_rf <- rand_forest() %>% 
  set_mode("classification") %>% 
  set_engine("ranger")
```

# Workflow do Modelo
```{r}
train_workflow <- workflow() %>% 
  add_formula(y ~.)
```

# Fit
```{r}
train_fit <- train_workflow %>% 
  add_model(modelo_rf) %>% 
  fit_resamples(resamples = train_boot,
                control = control_resamples(save_pred = TRUE))
```
